mapper.select: SELECT C.RNO, C.WRITER, C.CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(C.WDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS WDATE, C.COMMUNITY_SEQ FROM COMMENT C WHERE C.COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq} ORDER BY C.WDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, WRITER, CONTENTS, WDATE ) VALUES ( #{communitySeq}, #{writer}, #{contents}, #{wdate} )
